vote.title: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a Housing Opportunities for Persons with AIDS (HOPWA) Competitive Grant (Grant No. TX-H2001W024, CFDA No. 14.241) from the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) under the Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security Act (CARES Act), in an amount not to exceed $83,282.00, to provide short-term rent, mortgage, and utility assistance and supportive services for persons living with HIV/AIDS, for the period May 1, 2020 through April 30, 2023; (2) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $83,282.00 in the COVID-19 HOPWA Competitive Grant Fund; (3) receipt and deposit of grant funds as reimbursement from HUD in an amount not to exceed $83,282.00 in the COVID-19 HOPWA Competitive Grant Fund; and (4) execution of any and all agreements and other documents required by the grant - Not to exceed $83,282.00 - Financing: COVID-19 Housing Opportunities for Persons with AIDS Competitive Grant Funds
vote.description: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a Housing Opportunities for Persons with AIDS (HOPWA) Competitive Grant (Grant No. TX-H2001W024, CFDA No. 14.241) from the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) under the Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security Act (CARES Act), in an amount not to exceed $83,282.00, to provide short-term rent, mortgage, and utility assistance and supportive services for persons living with HIV/AIDS, for the period May 1, 2020 through April 30, 2023; (2) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $83,282.00 in the COVID-19 HOPWA Competitive Grant Fund; (3) receipt and deposit of grant funds as reimbursement from HUD in an amount not to exceed $83,282.00 in the COVID-19 HOPWA Competitive Grant Fund; and (4) execution of any and all agreements and other documents required by the grant - Not to exceed $83,282.00 - Financing: COVID-19 Housing Opportunities for Persons with AIDS Competitive Grant Funds
